price: "Yã Ubangijin mu! Mun yi imãni da abin da Ka saukar, kuma mun bi Manzon Ka, sai Ka rubũta mu tãre da mãsu shaida..*
arabic: رَبَّنَآ ءَامَنَّا بِمَآ أَنزَلۡتَ وَٱتَّبَعۡنَا ٱلرَّسُولَ فَٱكۡتُبۡنَا مَعَ ٱلشَّٰهِدِينَ
footnotes: * Masu shaida su ne Musulmi dõmin a cikin Attaura sũnansu mãsu shaida, mabiya Annabi Ummiyyi.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: rabbanā āmannā bimā anzalta wa-ittabaʿnā al-rasūla fa-uk'tub'nā maʿa al-shāhidīna
